title: RHOSLC & Just Like That
itunes:title: RHOSLC & Just Like That
itunes:subtitle: Danny touches on the new series And Just Like That (spoiler-free) and then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the cast back in Salt Lake City, WHISKney rebranding, and Jen's sit down with Heather! Plu...
description:
Danny touches on the new series And Just Like That (spoiler-free) and then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the cast back in Salt Lake City, WHISKney rebranding, and Jen's sit down with Heather! Plus, Lisa and Mer at a horse barn!


For a full, spoiler-filled recap of And Just Like That and more bonus episodes, subscribe to the Everything Iconic Patreon at Patreon.com/EverythingIconic !
